Package com.ee364project.helpers

Class Utilities

java.lang.Object
com.ee364project.helpers.Utilities
public class Utilities extends Object
This class provides various utility functions for the project.
Author:
Hamza Ayfan

    • getFakeData

      public static HasData[] getFakeData(int count, String cls)
      This method generates an array of fake objects of the specified class.
      Parameters:
      count - the number of objects to generate
      cls - the fully-qualified class name of the objects to generate
      Returns:
      an array of fake objects of the specified class

    • getRandomFromArray

      public static Object getRandomFromArray(Object[] objects)
      This method returns a random object from the specified array.
      Parameters:
      objects - the array of objects from which to select a random object
      Returns:
      a random object from the specified array

    • getRandomFromArray

      public static Object getRandomFromArray(ArrayList<?> objects)
      Returns a random element from the provided ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      objects - An ArrayList of objects from which to select a random element.
      Returns:
      A randomly selected element from the ArrayList, or null if the ArrayList is empty.

    • getRandomStringArray

      public static String[] getRandomStringArray(int len)
      Returns a random array of strings of length between 1 and 19, inclusive. Each string consists of a random number of words from the seniority method of the faker.job object, separated by spaces.
      Parameters:
      len - the desired length of the array
      Returns:
      a random array of strings of the specified length

    • getRandomStringArray

      public static String[] getRandomStringArray()
      Returns a random array of strings of length between 1 and 19, inclusive. Each string consists of a random number of words from the seniority method of the faker.job object, separated by spaces.
      Returns:
      a random array of strings of the specified length

    • joinStrings

      public static String joinStrings(String[] strings, String del)
      This method joins an array of strings together, separated by a delimiter.
      Parameters:
      strings - the array of strings to join
      del - the delimiter to use between strings
      Returns:
      the joined strings
